properties.description:
This is automation for a Bug - NEXTG-21489
Event trigger type stuck in Update-in-progress status on update operation

create a Events (Approval and Webhook) 
create a workflow , add a trigger with event type verify the status of the trigger 
open a trigger , update with differnt event and verify the status of the trigger
